tool_description:
This API is a subset of a larger Interface which will be released later that year.
It delivers fixtures,results, standings and statistics of Premier League's current season.
name: Premier League
title: Premier League

api_list.name: Standings
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sportdata.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/free/soccer/standings/premier-league"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportdata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Statistics
api_list.description: Get statistics of a match with id equal to matchid

api_list.name: Premier League Fixtures
api_list.description: Premier League's upcoming matches with UTC hour
